ivardefs.name: category
ivardefs.desc: The type of event which is important to characterize what occurred and caused harm to the subject, or had the potential to cause harm to the subject.

ivardefs.name: date
ivardefs.desc: The date (and perhaps time) when the adverse event occurred.

ivardefs.name: description
ivardefs.desc: Describes the adverse event in text.

ivardefs.name: eventParticipant
ivardefs.desc: Parties that may or should contribute or have contributed information to the Act. Such information includes information leading to the decision to perform the Act and how to perform the Act (e.g. consultant), information that the Act itself seeks to revea

ivardefs.name: identifier
ivardefs.desc: The identifier(s) of this adverse event that are assigned by business processes and/or used to refer to it when a direct URL reference to the resource itsefl is not appropriate.

ivardefs.name: location
ivardefs.desc: The information about where the adverse event occurred.

ivardefs.name: outcome
ivardefs.desc: Describes the type of outcome from the adverse event.

ivardefs.name: reaction_
ivardefs.desc: Includes information about the reaction that occurred as a result of exposure to a substance (for example, a drug or a chemical).

ivardefs.name: recorder
ivardefs.desc: Information on who recorded the adverse event.  May be the patient or a practitioner.

ivardefs.name: seriousness
ivardefs.desc: Describes the seriousness or severity of the adverse event.

ivardefs.name: subject
ivardefs.desc: This subject or group impacted by the event.  With a prospective adverse event, there will be no subject as the adverse event was prevented.

ivardefs.name: suspectEntity_
ivardefs.desc: Describes the entity that is suspected to have caused the adverse event.

ivardefs.name: type
ivardefs.desc: This element defines the specific type of event that occurred or that was prevented from occurring.
